Notes:
The collection includes historical and genealogical material concerning north Alabama and southern Tennessee with a special focus on Limestone County, Alabama.  The Limestone County Archives was created in October 1980 as the official county repository of Judge of Probate, Circuit Court, Board of Registrars, County Commissions, Tax Assessor, and Board of Education records.   The archives is funded and staffed by the County CommissioN

In addition to the governmental records, the archives has a county photograph collection and items donated by private citizens.  It is located in the county's historic post office building.
Source of Repository Data: Alabama Department of Archives and History
